name: Jeanne Mak
comment: Hi Grab, I had once a ride payment rejected by my credit card issuer once. I have since settled this payment and yet you won’t let me book a ride or order grabfood with my credit cards. Your staff has been completely unhelpful, suggesting that I either pay cash or add money onto my grab wallet. I do not wish to do any of those and want to pay with my credit cards, you are refusing to let me book any grab or order grab food with both my visa AND Amex. All you’re able to say is “sorry for the inconvenience”. How about you fix it and let me use my credit cards? You won’t have a monopoly for much longer. name: Grab
comment: Author  Hi Dezmond. To enhance the safety of our driver-partners, we will disable Cash bookings from 2am-6am ONLY starting November; and only allow Cashless bookings for Grab rides.*Cash bookings are not easily traceable to a person. In the past, we have seen criminal activities on Cash bookings during these hours. " Hi Dezmond.
